resources.string: We hope you make an optimum use\n of the app for your gains
Do not leave for tomorrow what you can do today

1. Dumbbell Press (3x16)
 2. Dumbbell Flys (3x12)
 3. Decline Press (3x18)
 4. Military Press (3x12)
 5. Dumbbell Rows (3x12)
 6. Lat Rows (3x18)
 7. Cable Rows (3x12)
 8. Barbell DeadLift (3x8)

1. Bicep Curls (3x16)
 2. Preacher Curls (3x12)
 3. Incline Curls (3x18)
 4. Hammer Curls (3x12)
 5. Tricep Extensions (3x12)
 6. Cable Pull Downs (3x18)
 7. SkullCrushers (3x12)
 8. Diamond Pushups (3x8)

1. Weighted Squats (3x16)
 2. Reverse Lunges (3x12)
 3. Side Lunges (3x18)
 4. Sumo Squats (3x12)
 5. Deadlifts (3x12)
 6. Planks (3x18)
 7. Hanging Knee Raise (3x12)
 8. Dumbbell Side Bends (3x8)
